import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about-us-screen', templateUrl: './about-us-screen.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-us-screen.component.css'] }) export class AboutUsScreenComponent { }

About Us

Best Customer Experience
About Us

Torque Car rentals is a world-renowned car rental brand that specializes in offering luxury vehicles for rent. In addition to offering standard car rental options, All Cars has a number of unique features for customers to enjoy during their travels. Each of Cars's locations has all the amenities necessary for a memorable stay.

When picking up your vehicle at your designated location, you must also know how to properly handle the paperwork.

What our Customers say

Reviews

Anon Daniels

"I recently rented a car from Torque. Car Rental and I have to say, it was one of the best rental experiences I've had. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, answering all of my questions and making sure I felt comfortable with the car before I left the lot. The car itself was in great condition and made my road trip so much more enjoyable. I would highly recommend Torque. Car Rental to anyone looking for a reliable and affordable rental car."

Steve belmont

"I recently rented a car from Torque. Car Rental for a vacation and was extremely impressed with the entire experience. The booking process was simple and straightforward, and the customer service representative was very helpful in answering all of my questions. When I arrived at the rental location, the staff was friendly and efficient, and the car was in great condition. The vehicle was clean, well-maintained, and had all of the features I needed for my trip. Overall, I would definitely recommend Torque. Car Rental to anyone in need of a rental car. They exceeded my expectations in every way."

Angelina whittaker

"I recently rented a car from Torque. Car Rental for a road trip and I have to say I was extremely impressed with their service. The rental process was seamless and the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. The car I rented was in great condition and I had no issues with it during my trip. I would highly recommend Torque. Car Rental to anyone looking for a convenient and reliable car rental experience."

Frequently Asked Questions

Reviews

Torque rents vehicles to individuals who are 25 or older.

Torque accepts most major credit cards, as well as Visa and Mastercard debit cards, and you can pay using paypal as a form of payment.

Car rental cost depends on a few factors such as location, availability, vehicle, length of the contract. See here for more details about each vehicle.
